page.title: 18Mr. Mellish the dentist
page.content: Mr.Mellish's work includes removing decay from teeth and repairing them with fillings.lf the teeth are too bad or if some one has too many, he will pull the teeth out . He uses many tools,including drills for removing decay, tools,including drills for removing decay,tools for cleaning teeth , shaping fillings, and extracting teeth. He sees about 120 people in a week. He works from 8.30 a.m. until 5.00 pm from Monday to Friday . Mr.Mellish enjoys his work because he says he meets lots of interesting people.
